summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City elections; changing the campaign period for calculating contribution limits and reporting; authorizing summary dismissal of certain complaints; requiring filing of a financial disclosure form with the City Clerk; revising hearing procedures; increasing assessments for late filings; forbidding donations for "office funds"; and making miscellaneous changes; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 2.04.070, -.090, -.170, -.220, -.300, -.330, -.370, -.500, -.510, and -.520, and subsections (7) and (13) of Section 2.04.010 and subsections B and D of Section 2.04.250; adding new Sections 2.04.075 and 2.04.375 and new subsections 2.04.010(28) and 2.04.250(H); and repealing Section 2.04.100 in connection therewith.
